website_summaries.verdict: A great entry-level 4K television with a zippy interface, easily adjustable picture, and great built-in sound.
pros: Very good picture that’s easy to adjust
Many owners rave about its built-in sound quality
Thin bezel, and lightweight unit overall
Little to no lag using apps
Included smart remote is a big plus
cons: Owners miss having a swivel on the base
A few reports of TV not working out of the box, or of firmware not working correctly
Issues with picture lag when gaming

customer_reviews.title: Love this TV - the bluetooth connected right to my ...
customer_reviews.text: Love this TV - the bluetooth connected right to my wireless earphones, the TV talked directly to my Directv DVR. I didnt have to do anything. Easy! The picture is clear. SO far the only bad thing i can say is the cord that plugs it in keeps falling out of the back of the TV - it doesnt connect tightly. It is an inconvenience.
customer_reviews.author: Lori D. Wright

customer_reviews.title: Love it with some misgivings
customer_reviews.text: Nice, clear picture. Had some problems setting it up. Called in a professional. Then, the Internet wouldn't work. Technician from Verizon came out, moved the router closer to the set and wired it. Now it works well.
customer_reviews.author: joan

customer_reviews.title: Great Picture
customer_reviews.text: I like the quality of the picture Samsung seems to make a good tv.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Excellent picture with other devices
customer_reviews.text: Son loves the TV. Using it with Sony PlayStation Pro 4. Excellent picture with other devices. Excellent deal if you want something small ;-)
customer_reviews.author: Wes S

customer_reviews.title: 40" Samsung UHD TV
customer_reviews.text: A great TV! The picture is fantastic! Easy wall mount and setup.
customer_reviews.author: blsj

customer_reviews.title: Great TV. I use it to stream and play ...
customer_reviews.text: Great TV. I use it to stream and play xbox. Excellent size for a small room for gaming and general movie watching
customer_reviews.author: Tori

customer_reviews.title: I'm very pleased with the contrast ratio
customer_reviews.text: I'm very pleased with the contrast ratio, brightness and picture quality on the Samsun UN40KU7000. All the "Smart Features" are a bit obnoxious (the TV has a virus scan feature?!), but I guess some people like that. I bought it to use as a computer monitor connected to a 2015 Macbook Pro and it looks great (after configuring the settings correctly)! I'm a software engineer who, after some research, realized the 40-43 inch 4k TVs are the best bet if you need a lot of screen real estate. I only notice a very slight input lag but it's in no way bothersome. Overall very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This TV has wonderful colors and clarity. It is easy to move.
customer_reviews.author: PM

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This TV delivers a great image and is stuffed with special Smart features.
customer_reviews.author: Kcotteri

customer_reviews.title: cannot believe the great quality. Unfortunately
customer_reviews.text: Crisp image; cannot believe the great quality. Unfortunately, the TV produces a better image than the cable signal can produce. So on some sport viewings, you get a blur around the players as they are moving around the turf.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Zagrocki

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like it a lot. I still haven't learned how to use all the functions.
customer_reviews.author: Mikevin

customer_reviews.title: Very good all the way around
customer_reviews.text: Very good all the way around. I use it as a computer monitor with a very high end graphics card and everything is so lifelike. Just like you could reach out and touch the real thing. I own 4 Samsung TV's at present ans they are the best the market has to offer. No defects,period. Very Highly Recommendedd William E. Myers
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good TV with a few minuses
customer_reviews.text: The TV is sharp and has good color and brightness. The narrow bezels save space. Wish it had analog audio output for comparability with my older peripherals. Also wish it had a video conferencing app like Skype. UHD and HDR appear to only work on input HDMI-1. This lessens the value of the other two HDMI ports.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Heald

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy for the Price
customer_reviews.text: It was all I expected and the price was acceptable for the features I got.
customer_reviews.author: tom

customer_reviews.title: Great TV
customer_reviews.text: Great TV. Been working for 2 years and still going.
customer_reviews.author: Gina Spradlin

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Perfect set for my bedroom, I watch a lot of U-tube and the picture is so clear and bright, and it picks up my Wi Fi signal from down stairs, I replaced a 32 inch Panasonic and wall mounted it and at 75 years old I don't need glasses to watch it.
customer_reviews.author: K. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: TV is awesome. Only problem I've had so far
customer_reviews.text: TV is awesome. Only problem I've had so far: if I'm watching something using my chromcast the TV will randomly switch inputs to one of my gaming counsels.
customer_reviews.author: Haaris Awan

customer_reviews.title: This TV was working great for months
customer_reviews.text: This TV was working great for months, but now it has two dime sized white spots in the middle of the screen. It looks like the back-light is over lighting . Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan J. Weatherhead

customer_reviews.title: GREAT TV, GREAT PICTURE.
customer_reviews.text: I love Samsung TV's and the picture on this one is just great. These TV's are getting more and more complicated, so it take a concerted effort to get it set up correctly, but once you do, it works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: R. Bates

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for my needs.
customer_reviews.text: Use this for my computer laptop main screen and PC gaming. Use it for my PS4. Use it for Amazon Prime video, Netflix, HBOGO, etc.. Love this TV - perfect size for my computer room on the desk. Any bigger and I wouldn't be able to sit this close.
customer_reviews.author: Roland Olson

customer_reviews.title: This TV is awesome. Amazing picture quality
customer_reviews.text: This TV is awesome. Amazing picture quality, and the Netflix and HBO Go apps are quick and responsive. I bought the 40" version for my bedroom right before my back surgery, so I've gotten a lot of use out of it in the last week. The Eco setting is great for a TV in the bedroom because it dims when the room is dark, which is great if you're someone like me and likes to fall asleep watching TV. It's amazing that you can get such a high-quality 4K TV for such a low price.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Mind-blowing!!!
customer_reviews.text: Going to get my eyes examined...and a new pair of glasses(A.S.A.P.)---SO I can really "see" the beauty of this fantastic display. So...stoked about this!! Totally unreal...
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Williamson

customer_reviews.title: He said it is the best TV he has ever owned
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a gift for our son. He said it is the best TV he has ever owned. Great picture. Great features.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny

customer_reviews.title: beautiful tv with some very flawed software
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful tv with some very flawed software. It's a smart tv and we love the features, but the apps break frequently and it needs to be HARD RESET. We need to physically unplug our tv once a week to restart it. That sucks.
customer_reviews.author: William Lazzaro

customer_reviews.title: Solid buy!
customer_reviews.text: I really was skeptical of getting a tv off of the internet and i gotta tell you it is way better than going to the store, i mean the tv arrived in perfect condition no screen damages, im sure the internals should be fine (i hope so) and the sound quality is amazing! Waaay better than what i expected huge step up from my last set i game primarily and it works wonderfully let me tell ya. The smart menu is fun to use, and the stand and sleek design of the tv are badass! Overall i'm impressed with this product from the time it got here, price, quality and speed.
customer_reviews.author: SrIsrael

customer_reviews.title: Don't Buy Samsung Products
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy! Apparently if you look at the screen cross-eyed it cracks (internal crack) and Samsung will not cover it even under warranty, it is consider physical damage. Sick over spending $600 .... lesson learned, this is the last Samsung product in my life time!
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Workmanship Issues?
customer_reviews.text: My TV, when displaying a dark image, leaks distorted light around the edge of the screen in 3 places. It isn't noticeable during fast moving sports or news, but during a movie, any evening or outer space scene is disappointing. I believe it to be a workmanship issue of this specific unit, and I decided to live with. I'd recommend you check yours for this upon receipt. Otherwise, other features perform as expected.
customer_reviews.author: jsc

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Xbox One S
customer_reviews.text: When I was researching this TV I was worried about whether it would meet all the 4k and HDR requirements of the Xbox one S. I'm very happy to say that it checks all the boxes! (Just make sure your Xbox is plugged into the yellow hdmi port)
customer_reviews.author: Nick Uhlenhuth

customer_reviews.title: Great picture but no control buttons
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, we will see what it's like in a year. My biggest complaint is it has no buttons on it, if the remote is lost or craps out your screwed.
customer_reviews.author: DocTylo

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts frustration
customer_reviews.text: arrived without screws needed to attach it to the stand! Samsung could not give size of screws - parts company could not help - samsungparts.com had no information. I am increasing to three stars because Amazon did work to find a solution to the challenge. They get a point for that. Once the tv was put together the set up was very easy and picture is great. Happy with purchase - frustrated with missing parts and challenges to resolve the issue. How hard should it be to tell me that I need a M4x10ml long with .70 pitch. I am grateful for a nerd husband that figure it out!
customer_reviews.author: Gigi

customer_reviews.title: Happy Samsung viewing😊
customer_reviews.text: We love the tv Good size screen.... Nice clarity TV in our guest room
customer_reviews.author: Gaven C Dunn

customer_reviews.title: ... change sound level and power plug comes loose very easily. The picture quality is very good
customer_reviews.text: I have had trouble with not being able to change sound level and power plug comes loose very easily. The picture quality is very good.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Choice for UHD TV
customer_reviews.text: Excellent display and operating system. The remote takes a bit of orientation and practice to use, but is well-documented. Wi-Fi works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: E

customer_reviews.title: It came on time but one thing I didn't like is when delivered it's exposed and anyone can see ...
customer_reviews.text: It came on time but one thing I didn't like is when delivered it's exposed and anyone can see that it's a tv...the mailman just left it on my porch I'm just glad no one stole it...other then that out has a great picture and very easy to set up..did not come with mounting screws so I gotta run to Lowe's too get them
customer_reviews.author: Cole

customer_reviews.title: Possible defect, never seen in any other LCD or UHD screen before
customer_reviews.text: Samsung quality has gone down a lot, don't know if it a defect but both TV's had black blurs kind of like a ruler all along the bottom panel. if you read a lot of subtitles you would definitely notice.
customer_reviews.author: Alejandro

customer_reviews.title: Image quality is fine BUT!!!
customer_reviews.text: Disaster quality (improper transportation) . First one is totally damaged whole screen was going to fall apart, so I asked for a replacement. However, the new one also have the same kind of problem: the upper edge of the screen is not fixed on the matel frame...I think it maybe caused by both improper transportation and bad quality control. I don't want to ask for another replacement so I push the screen back into the frame even though I know it is going to break a little. It did break a little...I can live with that though :-(
customer_reviews.author: TAN XIAO

customer_reviews.title: Bought one at Best Buy because we couldn't wait any longer for another ...
customer_reviews.text: The TV was received broken, (screen cracked) and had to be returned. Bought one at Best Buy because we couldn't wait any longer for another one.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: The first TV arrived cracked. The 2nd TV has ...
customer_reviews.text: The TV has a loose back. See the attached video for the loose back. Really shoddy quality control.
customer_reviews.author: Vikas Kedia

product_meta.title: Samsung UN55KU7000 55-Inch 4K Ultra HD Smart LED TV (2016 Model)
product_meta.description:
Size:55-Inch| Style:TVFeel the drama of blacker blacks and brighter brights with striking crispness. With 4K UHD resolution you’ll enjoy picture with 4x the detail of Full HD. See the difference precise color and contrast can make - and a Smart TV experience that puts your favorite content at your fingertips.

AMAZON.COM
feature_bullets: Smart Functionality: Yes, Built in Wi-Fi: Yes
Dimensions (W x H x D): TV without stand: 48.6" x 28.2" x 2.1", TV with stand: 48.6" x 31" x 13.1"
